title: Help Please - Unable to Connect to Server....

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: This happened to me last night.... I tried to get into 4 games but I couldn't because of this, and I don't what do!! I even had a perfect record before this happened to me where I have to wait 5 mins. to join a queue right now, which is absolutely crazy... I can't do knowing right now since I don't know how to handle this problem. Please Help! I want to enjoy the game like I did before this happened to me which basically ruined the fun. I've been trying to search for ways to fix it, on youtube, and on the LoL forums but I still hadn't found a solution yet :( I need someones help A.S.A.P. because at this point it is getting frustrating! I don't want to risk my account getting banned! I also tried to troubleshoot - nothing, and also restart my computer - nothing.  Additionally, can it be fixed by deleting the launcher, and re-downloading it, would that fix it? So it would be awesome if someone can help me, and hopefully this problem can be resolved in no time! Thanks for taking your time out of your precious lives to save me <3

replies.body: It looks like your network is unable to make a connection to the game server.  Go over each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to configure and strengthen your network.  I suggest testing it out in custom games to prevent penalties.  This should get you fixed up!
I think it's an IT problem. It always happens after I changed Runes or Masteries. Two years have passed, you still not solve this issue.
I think it didn't worked, or I missed something, I am really confused...
